metadata.title: CVE-2023-52441 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ksmbd: fix out of bounds in init_smb2_rsp_hdr()If client send smb2 negotiate request and then send smb1 negotiaterequest, init_smb2_rsp_hdr is called for smb1 negotiate request sinceneed_neg is set to false. This patch ignore smb1 packets after ->need_negis set to false.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
